Primary Location: United States (US) - Tennessee - Greeneville Function: Accounting / Finance Title: Operations Accounting Site Lead - 95589 Onsite/Remote: Onsite Position Your Responsibilities As an Operations Accounting Site Lead for John Deere Power Products located in Greeneville, TN, you will have the following responsibilities: Be the primary accounting lead at the unit and part of the Factory Leadership Team, helping to improve operations through insightful business counseling. Lead an efficient month-end closing process, actual, forecast analysis and reconciliations, general ledger activities, and enablement of final exhibits sign-off. Provide work direction and support to other accountants at the factory, helping management to nurture a productive, inclusive, fun, and engaged team. Keep strong internal controls, and support testing and audits. Lead a successful implementation of Central Finance in Greeneville.
